reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a lovely setting
reviews.text: This hotel is surrounded by glorious gardens that are very well tended. There's plenty of shade around the main pools which are large and clean. The "river" pool runs through the gardens and some of the rooms open directly on to it. The restaurant is excellent and serves a great selection of food that was well cooked and presented. The staff are attentive, always happy to help and our room was comfortable and well equipped.
